info.title: EOS API
info.description: Access a comprehensive collection of API endpoints for the EOS blockchain. To get started, obtain your API Key from the [Pinax App](https://app.pinax.network). For any questions or support, feel free to reach out to us on [Discord](https://discord.gg/pinax).

tags.name: Token API
tags.description: Token balances, transfers, holders & supply data

get.description: Historical token balances of an account.

get.summary: Token transfers from and to an account
get.description: All transfers related to an account.
